ProcessTemplates.Name: HTTP to ServiceNow - Create service request
ProcessTemplates.Description: This template process receives an HTTP POST request containing service request information in JSON format, and creates a service request into ServiceNow based on it.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"ServiceNowInstance":{"Value":"\"abc12345\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The name of your ServiceNow instance, found in the beginning of the instance URL."},"ServiceNowUsername":{"Value":"\"my.user\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"The username for your ServiceNow Instance."},"ServiceNowPassword":{"Value":"\"myPassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"The password of your ServiceNow user."}}

Process.Name: HTTP to ServiceNow - Create service request
Process.Description: This template process receives an HTTP POST request containing service request information in JSON format, and creates a service request into ServiceNow based on it.
